text: Robert Alan Sampson (born June 23, 1992) is an American former professional basketball player. He is the son of Hall of Fame player Ralph Sampson and the younger brother of Ralph Sampson III. ==References== ==External links== *Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets bio * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Argentina Category:American expatriate basketball people in Montenegro Category:American men's basketball players Category:Atenas basketball players Category:Basketball players from California Category:East Carolina Pirates men's basketball players Category:Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets men's basketball players Category:KK Mornar Bar players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Sacramento, California
title: Robert Sampson (basketball)
